full_summary:
**Sanitization Cabinets**
================================

### Government Tender Notification

**Contract Reference Number:** WS4423154620-Doc4423203081

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Publication Date:** February 16, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** March 28, 2024, by 2:00 PM EST

**Amendment Date:** March 26, 2024

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**UNSPSC Code:** 42191900 - Clinical Cabinetry

**End User Entity:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

**Regions of Delivery:** Regina and Yellowknife

**Description:** The RCMP has a requirement for the supply, delivery, and off-loading of two sanitization cabinets, each with different sizes (large and regular) in accordance with the specifications detailed in the provided document.

### Important Details

* All bids must be submitted by March 28, 2024, by 2:00 PM EST.
* Bids submitted after the specified closing time will be considered non-responsive.
* The contract is expected to commence on February 29, 2024, and end on March 31, 2024.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Ben Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not provided

### Notice URL

The tender notice can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18816930?extsite=MTg4MTY5MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18816930?extsite=MTg4MTY5MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) - Achats Canada

### Closing

Please note that this is an amendment to the original tender notification, regarding the closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be made before the specified closing time to be considered responsive. 디오
